Thank you to our guest, the Holocaust Awareness Museum and Education Center, and Mr. Burd for his coordination of the event!

The bags were distributed by SELF Inc., a nonprofit that operates seven shelters in Philadelphia. The January 21 effort followed a donation drive the students held in October to collect supplies such as shampoo, toothpaste, hair brushes and socks. A representative from SELF and one of the organization’s former clients spoke to the students about the impact of this critical outreach. https://schoollane.org/apps/news/show_news.jsp?REC_ID=548355&id=0
